Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; BURNED, REDUCED; ENGRAVED
Name: Terracotta of Isis - Agraria
Description: Pitcher with the figure of Isis - Agraria, naked and seated on a wicker basket. The arms are down by her sides and she rests her hands on her legs, which are apart. On the right-hand side is the beginning of a handle. At the back the buttocks and the wicker basket can be seen.
